name: Web Design: Website Project
body:
### WP1: Setting Up

Brainstorm 

Objectives 
- To appeal to mostly teenagers in Hong Kong 

Online Clothing Shop (Store) 
- This is for people who have insecurities with trying on or shopping for clothes in an actual shop
- Can order online and sent to you home (efficiency) 
- Appeals to Teenagers 

Food Adventures in Hong Kong 
- This is for people who are interested in looking at review and the popularity of restaurants only in Hong Kong  
- Appeals to Children, Teenagers and Adults
- Votes (Ratings) 

Doctor App 
- A website that appeals to people who are sick and would like to see their symptoms or possible sickness online 

Final Idea

Objective: To appeal to teenagers in Hong Kong about food 

Client: Children, Teenagers, Adults in Hong Kong or visiting Hong Kong


We decided to choose the Food Adventures in Hong Kong. Both of us will explore Hong Kong's cuisines and take pictures, upload and rate on our website. Other people who visit our website will be able to upload their experience, ratings and reviews.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
